concept-wr.title: VNF Resource Scaling
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can autoscale VNF resources up/down by dynamically increasing or decreasing the number of virtual CPUs. This can be done to optimize the resource usage according to the application's demand for computational power.

conbody.p: Guest Server Scaling is a service to allow a guest to scale the capacity of a single guest server up and down on demand. Current supported scaling operation is CPU scaling.
The output of both the wrs-guest-scale SDK module and the wrs-server-group SDK module are required to be installed in a guest image for guest resource scaling.
